summary:
I'm an experienced web and digital designer with a Masters degree in Design of Visual Communications who absolutely loves the tech industry.

In the past 15 years, my design work was primarily connected to the music industry where I co-created and developed one of Croatia's most popular rap bands, receiving widespread recognition, including 82 million views on YouTube, MTV Double Platinum Award, and numerous other critical accolades. In parallel to this, I collaborated with diverse clients across different industries, continuing to refine my skills and knowledge. 

The software universe remains a realm of exploration and world creation, and I am committed to co-building this digital frontier that complements our physical reality. More than purely creative, I want to be useful. Designing and creating next-gen digital products is the space I see myself giving the most.

Send me a nice msg! Let’s mind melt and create something to be proud of!

Months of research led to interviews with people around us on how they look at the finite time that they have.

The valuable insights we obtained from these interviews fueled the creation of Staire. Our intent was to address the daily lack of focus and help people in maintaining a long-term commitment. Despite the abundance of to-do list and habit tracking apps, we believed that there was a need for a dedicated space that focuses exclusively on your most significant goal – your life's work.

I was a product owner, UX Researcher, UI designer, Web designer, and I worked with Mixpanel to track analytics. Basically a two-man startup shop.
